tagblock.name: Squad Specifications

int16.name: Weight
int16.tooltip: The relative weight given to this squad spawning

tagblock.comment: When spawning a number of squads from this wave template, try and spawn at least the minimum number, and at most the maximum number. Once these min/max bounds have been met, probabilistic distribution will continue.

int8.name: Min Spawn
int8.tooltip: Spawn AT LEAST this number of squads. Value of 0 means "no minimum"

int8.name: Max Spawn
int8.tooltip: Spawn NO MORE THAN this number of squads. Value of 0 means "no maximum"

enum32.name: Placement Filter
enum32.tooltip: Filter where this squad specification can spawn by matching this value with the values in squad definitions in the scenario
